dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2769 : Stop Playing on Citizens’ Cash Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To impose a moratorium on conferences held by the Internal Revenue Service.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop Playing on Citizens’ Cash Act.
The Internal Revenue Service shall not hold any conference until the Treasury Inspector General for Tax Administration submits a report to Congress—

paragraph.text: certifying that the Internal Revenue Service has implemented all of the recommendations set out in such Inspector General’s report titled Review of the August 2010 Small Business/Self-Employed Division’s Conference in Anaheim, California, and

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 31, 2013.
